title: Low FPS. . .
body: My FPS Max is like 45-50 but it drops down to 01 during running games & I lagg alot. Anyways to have higher FPS?

replies.body: There could be a few reasons why your fps might be lower like outdated drivers, game files, or even the condition of your computer.  I recommend going over our [FPS issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)guide to help you out, but if your fps has always been like this then there may other hardware issues causing it.  Hope that helps!
